physical_appearance:\The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a building with a cupola at the centre of the photograph. The building consists of a portico as well. To the right of this building
 is another building with a long façade that comes with a colonnade. Nearer to the foreground of the photograph and towards the left hand side stands a building whereby \\Victoria Theatre\\ is stated on the front exterior. It has a clock tower and a front yard. Vehicles and people can be seen on the streets at the foreground of the photograph.\

metadata.title_text: Victoria Memorial Hall, Old Supreme Court, and City Hall Building Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
metadata.physical_appearance: "The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a building with a cupola at the centre of the photograph. The building consists of a portico as well. To the right of this building, is another building with a long façade that comes with a colonnade. Nearer to the foreground of the photograph and towards the left hand side stands a building whereby ""Victoria Theatre"" is stated on the front exterior. It has a clock tower and a front yard. Vehicles and people can be seen on the streets at the foreground of the photograph."
